001package squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.Gdx;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
005import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.GL20;
006import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Mesh;
007import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
008import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttribute;
009import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.VertexAttributes;
010import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch;
011import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion;
012import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram;
013import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Affine2;
014import com.badlogic.gdx.math.MathUtils;
015import com.badlogic.gdx.math.Matrix4;
016import squidpony.squidmath.NumberTools;
017
018import java.nio.Buffer;
019
020/**
021 * A drop-in substitute for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch} that filters any colors used to tint text
022 * or images using a {@link FloatFilter}. The filter may have an effect on speed in some cases, but even moderately
023 * complex filters like {@link FloatFilters.YCbCrFilter} seem to perform perfectly well, spiking at above 1000 FPS on
024 * SparseDemo with a filter that changes parameters. This class should be preferred over SpriteBatch when using
025 * SquidLib's style of frequently changing the Batch color; as of libGDX 1.9.9, SpriteBatch is somewhat slower than
026 * FilterBatch when FilterBatch is using the default {@link FloatFilters#identityFilter}. This is because 1.9.9 changed
027 * SpriteBatch to do more work when setting a color, and FilterBatch keeps the older, faster way of color changing. It
028 * may be slower if used for Tiled map renderers in libGDX or for {@link com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.NinePatch}
029 * instances, which both need to reset a Color object frequently, but not much else in libGDX specifically needs the
030 * Color object {@link #getColor()} returns, and many things do fine with {@link #getPackedColor()}, which is faster.
031 * Note that for games that use 2D sprite graphics, there's very low overhead to 1.9.9's SpriteBatch, and it mostly has
032 * issues with overdraw (which every glyph of text drawn over a background contributes towards).
033 * <br>
034 * Most FloatFilter varieties don't have much overhead, and I encourage you to try some to quickly produce graphical
035 * effects in a game. As a simple example, {@link FloatFilters#grayscaleFilter} is a constant FloatFilter that makes
036 * all colors, well, grayscale; you could apply it during things like flashback sequences or when the player is dazed.
037 * <br>
038 * As a more complex example, changing the warmth of a color (as well as its lightness) is relatively easy with a
039 * {@link FloatFilters.YCwCmFilter} that adds to or subtracts from Cw (chromatic warmth) and may change Y (lightness).
040 * With that same filter, if the protagonist is partially blinded, you could set the multipliers for Cw and Cm
041 * (chromatic mildness; determines whether a color is closer to mild colors like green/yellow or bold colors like
042 * red/blue) to floats between 0.1 and 0.5 or so, which takes even intense colors and makes them diluted and grayish.
043 * You could also change Y to be brighter or darker depending on whether a bright light blinded the protagonist, or some
044 * mud was thrown in their eyes, etc.
045 * <br>
046 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 8/2/2018.
047 */
048public class FilterBatch implements Batch {
049    private static final int SPRITE_SIZE = 20;
050    
051    public FloatFilter filter;
052    
053    private final Mesh mesh;
054
055    final float[] vertices;
056    int idx;
057    Texture lastTexture;
058    float invTexWidth, invTexHeight;
059
060    boolean drawing;
061
062    private final Matrix4 transformMatrix = new Matrix4();
063    private final Matrix4 projectionMatrix = new Matrix4();
064    private final Matrix4 combinedMatrix = new Matrix4();
065
066    private boolean blendingDisabled;
067    private int blendSrcFunc = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
068    private int blendDstFunc = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
069    private int blendSrcFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_SRC_ALPHA;
070    private int blendDstFuncAlpha = GL20.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA;
071
072    private final ShaderProgram shader;
073    private ShaderProgram customShader;
074    private boolean ownsShader;
075
076    float color = Color.WHITE.toFloatBits();
077    private final Color tempColor = new Color(1, 1, 1, 1);
078
079    /** Number of render calls since the last {@link #begin()}. **/
080    public int renderCalls;
081
082    /** Number of rendering calls, ever. Will not be reset unless set manually. **/
083    public int totalRenderCalls;
084
085    /** The maximum number of sprites rendered in one batch so far. **/
086    public int maxSpritesInBatch;
087
088    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, the default shader, and no changes in the
089     * color filter.
090     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram) */
091    public FilterBatch () {
092        this(1000, null, FloatFilters.identityFilter);
093    }
094
095    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, the default shader, and the given
096     * color filter.
097     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram, FloatFilter) */
098    public FilterBatch (FloatFilter filter) {
099        this(1000, null, filter);
100    }
101
102    /** Constructs a FilterBatch with one buffer, the default shader, and no changes in the color filter.
103     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram, FloatFilter) */
104    public FilterBatch (int size) {
105        this(size, null, FloatFilters.identityFilter);
106    }
107
108    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch with a size of 1000, one buffer, the default shader, and the given
109     * color filter.
110     * @see FilterBatch#FilterBatch(int, ShaderProgram, FloatFilter) */
111    public FilterBatch (int size, FloatFilter filter) {
112        this(size, null, filter);
113    }
114
115    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
116     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
117     * respect to the current screen resolution.
118     * <p>
119     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
120     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
121     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 8191.
122     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the FilterBatch and must be disposed separately. */
123    public FilterBatch (int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader) {
124        this(size, defaultShader, FloatFilters.identityFilter);
125    }
126
127    /** Constructs a new FilterBatch. Sets the projection matrix to an orthographic projection with y-axis point upwards, x-axis
128     * point to the right and the origin being in the bottom left corner of the screen. The projection will be pixel perfect with
129     * respect to the current screen resolution.
130     * <p>
131     * The defaultShader specifies the shader to use. Note that the names for uniforms for this default shader are different than
132     * the ones expect for shaders set with {@link #setShader(ShaderProgram)}. See {@link #createDefaultShader()}.
133     * @param size The max number of sprites in a single batch. Max of 8191.
134     * @param defaultShader The default shader to use. This is not owned by the FilterBatch and must be disposed separately. */
135    public FilterBatch (int size, ShaderProgram defaultShader, FloatFilter filter) {
136        // 32767 is max vertex index, so 32767 / 4 vertices per sprite = 8191 sprites max.
137        if (size > 8191) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Can't have more than 8191 sprites per batch: " + size);
138
139        Mesh.VertexDataType vertexDataType = (Gdx.gl30 != null) ? Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexBufferObjectWithVAO : Mesh.VertexDataType.VertexArray;
140
141        mesh = new Mesh(vertexDataType, false, size * 4, size * 6,
142                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.Position, 2, ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE),
143                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.ColorPacked, 4, ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE),
144                new VertexAttribute(VertexAttributes.Usage.TextureCoordinates, 2, ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0"));
145
146        projectionMatrix.setToOrtho2D(0, 0, Gdx.graphics.getWidth(), Gdx.graphics.getHeight());
147
148        vertices = new float[size * SPRITE_SIZE];
149
150        int len = size * 6;
151        short[] indices = new short[len];
152        short j = 0;
153        for (int i = 0; i < len; i += 6, j += 4) {
154            indices[i] = j;
155            indices[i + 1] = (short)(j + 1);
156            indices[i + 2] = (short)(j + 2);
157            indices[i + 3] = (short)(j + 2);
158            indices[i + 4] = (short)(j + 3);
159            indices[i + 5] = j;
160        }
161        mesh.setIndices(indices);
162
163        if (defaultShader == null) {
164            shader = createDefaultShader();
165            ownsShader = true;
166        } else
167            shader = defaultShader;
168        this.filter = filter;
169    }
170
171    /** Returns a new instance of the default shader used by FilterBatch for GL2 when no shader is specified. */
172    static public ShaderProgram createDefaultShader () {
173        String vertexShader = "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
174                + "attribute vec4 " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
175                + "attribute vec2 " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
176                + "uniform mat4 u_projTrans;\n" //
177                + "varying vec4 v_color;\n" //
178                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
179                + "\n" //
180                + "void main()\n" //
181                + "{\n" //
182                + "   v_color = " + ShaderProgram.COLOR_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
183                + "   v_color.a = v_color.a * (255.0/254.0);\n" //
184                + "   v_texCoords = " + ShaderProgram.TEXCOORD_ATTRIBUTE + "0;\n" //
185                + "   gl_Position =  u_projTrans * " + ShaderProgram.POSITION_ATTRIBUTE + ";\n" //
186                + "}\n";
187        String fragmentShader = "#ifdef GL_ES\n" //
188                + "#define LOWP lowp\n" //
189                + "precision mediump float;\n" //
190                + "#else\n" //
191                + "#define LOWP \n" //
192                + "#endif\n" //
193                + "varying LOWP vec4 v_color;\n" //
194                + "varying vec2 v_texCoords;\n" //
195                + "uniform sampler2D u_texture;\n" //
196                + "void main()\n"//
197                + "{\n" //
198                + "  gl_FragColor = v_color * texture2D(u_texture, v_texCoords);\n" //
199                + "}";
200
201        ShaderProgram shader = new ShaderProgram(vertexShader, fragmentShader);
202        if (!shader.isCompiled()) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Error compiling shader: " + shader.getLog());
203        return shader;
204    }
205
206    @Override
207    public void begin () {
208        if (drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.end must be called before begin.");
209        renderCalls = 0;
210
211        Gdx.gl.glDepthMask(false);
212        if (customShader != null)
213            customShader.bind();
214        else
215            shader.bind();
216        setupMatrices();
217
218        drawing = true;
219    }
220
221    @Override
222    public void end () {
223        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before end.");
224        if (idx > 0) flush();
225        lastTexture = null;
226        drawing = false;
227
228        GL20 gl = Gdx.gl;
229        gl.glDepthMask(true);
230        if (isBlendingEnabled()) gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
231    }
232
233    @Override
234    public void setColor (Color tint) {
235        color = filter.alter(tint.toFloatBits());
236    }
237
238    @Override
239    public void setColor (float r, float g, float b, float a) {
240        color = filter.alter(NumberTools.intBitsToFloat(((int)(255 * a) << 24 & 0xFE000000)
241                | (int)(255 * b) << 16 | (int)(255 * g) << 8 | (int)(255 * r)));
242    }
243
244    public void setColor (final float color) {
245        this.color = filter.alter(color);
246    }
247
248    @Override
249    public void setPackedColor (final float color) {
250        this.color = filter.alter(color);
251    }
252
253    @Override
254    public Color getColor () {
255        final int intBits = NumberTools.floatToIntBits(color);
256        Color color = tempColor;
257        color.r = (intBits & 0xff) / 255f;
258        color.g = ((intBits >>> 8) & 0xff) / 255f;
259        color.b = ((intBits >>> 16) & 0xff) / 255f;
260        color.a = ((intBits >>> 24) & 0xff) / 255f;
261        return color;
262    }
263
264    @Override
265    public float getPackedColor () {
266        return color;
267    }
268
269    @Override
270    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height, float scaleX,
271                      float scaleY, float rotation, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
272        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
273
274        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
275
276        if (texture != lastTexture)
277            switchTexture(texture);
278        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
279            flush();
280
281        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
282        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
283        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
284        float fx = -originX;
285        float fy = -originY;
286        float fx2 = width - originX;
287        float fy2 = height - originY;
288
289        // scale
290        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
291            fx *= scaleX;
292            fy *= scaleY;
293            fx2 *= scaleX;
294            fy2 *= scaleY;
295        }
296
297        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
298        final float p1x = fx;
299        final float p1y = fy;
300        final float p2x = fx;
301        final float p2y = fy2;
302        final float p3x = fx2;
303        final float p3y = fy2;
304        final float p4x = fx2;
305        final float p4y = fy;
306
307        float x1;
308        float y1;
309        float x2;
310        float y2;
311        float x3;
312        float y3;
313        float x4;
314        float y4;
315
316        // rotate
317        if (rotation != 0) {
318            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
319            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
320
321            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
322            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
323
324            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
325            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
326
327            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
328            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
329
330            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
331            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
332        } else {
333            x1 = p1x;
334            y1 = p1y;
335
336            x2 = p2x;
337            y2 = p2y;
338
339            x3 = p3x;
340            y3 = p3y;
341
342            x4 = p4x;
343            y4 = p4y;
344        }
345
346        x1 += worldOriginX;
347        y1 += worldOriginY;
348        x2 += worldOriginX;
349        y2 += worldOriginY;
350        x3 += worldOriginX;
351        y3 += worldOriginY;
352        x4 += worldOriginX;
353        y4 += worldOriginY;
354
355        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
356        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
357        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
358        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
359
360        if (flipX) {
361            float tmp = u;
362            u = u2;
363            u2 = tmp;
364        }
365
366        if (flipY) {
367            float tmp = v;
368            v = v2;
369            v2 = tmp;
370        }
371
372        float color = this.color;
373        int idx = this.idx;
374        vertices[idx] = x1;
375        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
376        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
377        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
378        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
379
380        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
381        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
382        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
383        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
384        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
385
386        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
387        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
388        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
389        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
390        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
391
392        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
393        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
394        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
395        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
396        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
397        this.idx = idx + 20;
398    }
399
400    @Override
401    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth,
402                      int srcHeight, boolean flipX, boolean flipY) {
403        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
404
405        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
406
407        if (texture != lastTexture)
408            switchTexture(texture);
409        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
410            flush();
411
412        float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
413        float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
414        float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
415        float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
416        final float fx2 = x + width;
417        final float fy2 = y + height;
418
419        if (flipX) {
420            float tmp = u;
421            u = u2;
422            u2 = tmp;
423        }
424
425        if (flipY) {
426            float tmp = v;
427            v = v2;
428            v2 = tmp;
429        }
430
431        float color = this.color;
432        int idx = this.idx;
433        vertices[idx] = x;
434        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
435        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
436        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
437        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
438
439        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
440        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
441        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
442        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
443        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
444
445        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
446        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
447        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
448        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
449        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
450
451        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
452        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
453        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
454        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
455        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
456        this.idx = idx + 20;
457    }
458
459    @Override
460    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight) {
461        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
462
463        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
464
465        if (texture != lastTexture)
466            switchTexture(texture);
467        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
468            flush();
469
470        final float u = srcX * invTexWidth;
471        final float v = (srcY + srcHeight) * invTexHeight;
472        final float u2 = (srcX + srcWidth) * invTexWidth;
473        final float v2 = srcY * invTexHeight;
474        final float fx2 = x + srcWidth;
475        final float fy2 = y + srcHeight;
476
477        float color = this.color;
478        int idx = this.idx;
479        vertices[idx] = x;
480        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
481        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
482        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
483        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
484
485        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
486        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
487        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
488        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
489        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
490
491        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
492        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
493        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
494        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
495        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
496
497        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
498        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
499        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
500        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
501        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
502        this.idx = idx + 20;
503    }

505    @Override
506    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height, float u, float v, float u2, float v2) {
507        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
508
509        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
510
511        if (texture != lastTexture)
512            switchTexture(texture);
513        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
514            flush();
515
516        final float fx2 = x + width;
517        final float fy2 = y + height;
518
519        float color = this.color;
520        int idx = this.idx;
521        vertices[idx] = x;
522        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
523        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
524        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
525        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
526
527        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
528        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
529        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
530        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
531        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
532
533        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
534        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
535        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
536        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
537        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
538
539        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
540        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
541        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
542        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
543        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
544        this.idx = idx + 20;
545    }
546
547    @Override
548    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y) {
549        draw(texture, x, y, texture.getWidth(), texture.getHeight());
550    }
551
552    @Override
553    public void draw (Texture texture, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
554        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
555
556        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
557
558        if (texture != lastTexture)
559            switchTexture(texture);
560        else if (idx == vertices.length) //
561            flush();
562
563        final float fx2 = x + width;
564        final float fy2 = y + height;
565        final float u = 0;
566        final float v = 1;
567        final float u2 = 1;
568        final float v2 = 0;
569
570        float color = this.color;
571        int idx = this.idx;
572        vertices[idx] = x;
573        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
574        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
575        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
576        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
577
578        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
579        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
580        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
581        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
582        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
583
584        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
585        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
586        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
587        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
588        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
589
590        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
591        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
592        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
593        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
594        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
595        this.idx = idx + 20;
596    }
597
598    @Override
599    public void draw (Texture texture, float[] spriteVertices, int offset, int count) {
600        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
601
602        int verticesLength = vertices.length;
603        int remainingVertices = verticesLength;
604        if (texture != lastTexture)
605            switchTexture(texture);
606        else {
607            remainingVertices -= idx;
608            if (remainingVertices == 0) {
609                flush();
610                remainingVertices = verticesLength;
611            }
612        }
613        int copyCount = Math.min(remainingVertices, count);
614
615        System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, idx, copyCount);
616        idx += copyCount;
617        count -= copyCount;
618        while (count > 0) {
619            offset += copyCount;
620            flush();
621            copyCount = Math.min(verticesLength, count);
622            System.arraycopy(spriteVertices, offset, vertices, 0, copyCount);
623            idx += copyCount;
624            count -= copyCount;
625        }
626    }
627
628    @Override
629    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y) {
630        draw(region, x, y, region.getRegionWidth(), region.getRegionHeight());
631    }
632
633    @Override
634    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float width, float height) {
635        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
636
637        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
638
639        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
640        if (texture != lastTexture) {
641            switchTexture(texture);
642        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
643            flush();
644        }
645        final float fx2 = x + width;
646        final float fy2 = y + height;
647        final float u = region.getU();
648        final float v = region.getV2();
649        final float u2 = region.getU2();
650        final float v2 = region.getV();
651
652        float color = this.color;
653        int idx = this.idx;
654        vertices[idx] = x;
655        vertices[idx + 1] = y;
656        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
657        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
658        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
659
660        vertices[idx + 5] = x;
661        vertices[idx + 6] = fy2;
662        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
663        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
664        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
665
666        vertices[idx + 10] = fx2;
667        vertices[idx + 11] = fy2;
668        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
669        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
670        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
671
672        vertices[idx + 15] = fx2;
673        vertices[idx + 16] = y;
674        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
675        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
676        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
677        this.idx = idx + 20;
678    }
679
680    @Override
681    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
682                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation) {
683        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
684
685        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
686
687        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
688        if (texture != lastTexture) {
689            switchTexture(texture);
690        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
691            flush();
692
693        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
694        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
695        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
696        float fx = -originX;
697        float fy = -originY;
698        float fx2 = width - originX;
699        float fy2 = height - originY;
700
701        // scale
702        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
703            fx *= scaleX;
704            fy *= scaleY;
705            fx2 *= scaleX;
706            fy2 *= scaleY;
707        }
708
709        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
710        final float p1x = fx;
711        final float p1y = fy;
712        final float p2x = fx;
713        final float p2y = fy2;
714        final float p3x = fx2;
715        final float p3y = fy2;
716        final float p4x = fx2;
717        final float p4y = fy;
718
719        float x1;
720        float y1;
721        float x2;
722        float y2;
723        float x3;
724        float y3;
725        float x4;
726        float y4;
727
728        // rotate
729        if (rotation != 0) {
730            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
731            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
732
733            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
734            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
735
736            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
737            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
738
739            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
740            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
741
742            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
743            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
744        } else {
745            x1 = p1x;
746            y1 = p1y;
747
748            x2 = p2x;
749            y2 = p2y;
750
751            x3 = p3x;
752            y3 = p3y;
753
754            x4 = p4x;
755            y4 = p4y;
756        }
757
758        x1 += worldOriginX;
759        y1 += worldOriginY;
760        x2 += worldOriginX;
761        y2 += worldOriginY;
762        x3 += worldOriginX;
763        y3 += worldOriginY;
764        x4 += worldOriginX;
765        y4 += worldOriginY;
766
767        final float u = region.getU();
768        final float v = region.getV2();
769        final float u2 = region.getU2();
770        final float v2 = region.getV();
771
772        float color = this.color;
773        int idx = this.idx;
774        vertices[idx] = x1;
775        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
776        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
777        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
778        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
779
780        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
781        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
782        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
783        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
784        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
785
786        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
787        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
788        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
789        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
790        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
791
792        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
793        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
794        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
795        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
796        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
797        this.idx = idx + 20;
798    }
799
800    @Override
801    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float x, float y, float originX, float originY, float width, float height,
802                      float scaleX, float scaleY, float rotation, boolean clockwise) {
803        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
804
805        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
806
807        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
808        if (texture != lastTexture) {
809            switchTexture(texture);
810        } else if (idx == vertices.length) //
811            flush();
812
813        // bottom left and top right corner points relative to origin
814        final float worldOriginX = x + originX;
815        final float worldOriginY = y + originY;
816        float fx = -originX;
817        float fy = -originY;
818        float fx2 = width - originX;
819        float fy2 = height - originY;
820
821        // scale
822        if (scaleX != 1 || scaleY != 1) {
823            fx *= scaleX;
824            fy *= scaleY;
825            fx2 *= scaleX;
826            fy2 *= scaleY;
827        }
828
829        // construct corner points, start from top left and go counter clockwise
830        final float p1x = fx;
831        final float p1y = fy;
832        final float p2x = fx;
833        final float p2y = fy2;
834        final float p3x = fx2;
835        final float p3y = fy2;
836        final float p4x = fx2;
837        final float p4y = fy;
838
839        float x1;
840        float y1;
841        float x2;
842        float y2;
843        float x3;
844        float y3;
845        float x4;
846        float y4;
847
848        // rotate
849        if (rotation != 0) {
850            final float cos = MathUtils.cosDeg(rotation);
851            final float sin = MathUtils.sinDeg(rotation);
852
853            x1 = cos * p1x - sin * p1y;
854            y1 = sin * p1x + cos * p1y;
855
856            x2 = cos * p2x - sin * p2y;
857            y2 = sin * p2x + cos * p2y;
858
859            x3 = cos * p3x - sin * p3y;
860            y3 = sin * p3x + cos * p3y;
861
862            x4 = x1 + (x3 - x2);
863            y4 = y3 - (y2 - y1);
864        } else {
865            x1 = p1x;
866            y1 = p1y;
867
868            x2 = p2x;
869            y2 = p2y;
870
871            x3 = p3x;
872            y3 = p3y;
873
874            x4 = p4x;
875            y4 = p4y;
876        }
877
878        x1 += worldOriginX;
879        y1 += worldOriginY;
880        x2 += worldOriginX;
881        y2 += worldOriginY;
882        x3 += worldOriginX;
883        y3 += worldOriginY;
884        x4 += worldOriginX;
885        y4 += worldOriginY;
886
887        float u1, v1, u2, v2, u3, v3, u4, v4;
888        if (clockwise) {
889            u1 = region.getU2();
890            v1 = region.getV2();
891            u2 = region.getU();
892            v2 = region.getV2();
893            u3 = region.getU();
894            v3 = region.getV();
895            u4 = region.getU2();
896            v4 = region.getV();
897        } else {
898            u1 = region.getU();
899            v1 = region.getV();
900            u2 = region.getU2();
901            v2 = region.getV();
902            u3 = region.getU2();
903            v3 = region.getV2();
904            u4 = region.getU();
905            v4 = region.getV2();
906        }
907
908        float color = this.color;
909        int idx = this.idx;
910        vertices[idx] = x1;
911        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
912        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
913        vertices[idx + 3] = u1;
914        vertices[idx + 4] = v1;
915
916        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
917        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
918        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
919        vertices[idx + 8] = u2;
920        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
921
922        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
923        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
924        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
925        vertices[idx + 13] = u3;
926        vertices[idx + 14] = v3;
927
928        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
929        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
930        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
931        vertices[idx + 18] = u4;
932        vertices[idx + 19] = v4;
933        this.idx = idx + 20;
934    }
935
936    @Override
937    public void draw (TextureRegion region, float width, float height, Affine2 transform) {
938        if (!drawing) throw new IllegalStateException("FilterBatch.begin must be called before draw.");
939
940        float[] vertices = this.vertices;
941
942        Texture texture = region.getTexture();
943        if (texture != lastTexture) {
944            switchTexture(texture);
945        } else if (idx == vertices.length) {
946            flush();
947        }
948
949        // construct corner points
950        float x1 = transform.m02;
951        float y1 = transform.m12;
952        float x2 = transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
953        float y2 = transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
954        float x3 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m01 * height + transform.m02;
955        float y3 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m11 * height + transform.m12;
956        float x4 = transform.m00 * width + transform.m02;
957        float y4 = transform.m10 * width + transform.m12;
958
959        float u = region.getU();
960        float v = region.getV2();
961        float u2 = region.getV2();
962        float v2 = region.getV();
963
964        float color = this.color;
965        int idx = this.idx;
966        vertices[idx] = x1;
967        vertices[idx + 1] = y1;
968        vertices[idx + 2] = color;
969        vertices[idx + 3] = u;
970        vertices[idx + 4] = v;
971
972        vertices[idx + 5] = x2;
973        vertices[idx + 6] = y2;
974        vertices[idx + 7] = color;
975        vertices[idx + 8] = u;
976        vertices[idx + 9] = v2;
977
978        vertices[idx + 10] = x3;
979        vertices[idx + 11] = y3;
980        vertices[idx + 12] = color;
981        vertices[idx + 13] = u2;
982        vertices[idx + 14] = v2;
983
984        vertices[idx + 15] = x4;
985        vertices[idx + 16] = y4;
986        vertices[idx + 17] = color;
987        vertices[idx + 18] = u2;
988        vertices[idx + 19] = v;
989        this.idx = idx + 20;
990    }
991
992    @Override
993    public void flush () {
994        if (idx == 0) return;
995
996        renderCalls++;
997        totalRenderCalls++;
998        int spritesInBatch = idx / 20;
999        if (spritesInBatch > maxSpritesInBatch) maxSpritesInBatch = spritesInBatch;
1000        int count = spritesInBatch * 6;
1001
1002        lastTexture.bind();
1003        Mesh mesh = this.mesh;
1004        mesh.setVertices(vertices, 0, idx);
1005        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).position(0);
1006        ((Buffer)mesh.getIndicesBuffer()).limit(count);
1007
1008        if (blendingDisabled) {
1009            Gdx.gl.glDisable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1010        } else {
1011            Gdx.gl.glEnable(GL20.GL_BLEND);
1012            if (blendSrcFunc != -1) Gdx.gl.glBlendFuncSeparate(blendSrcFunc, blendDstFunc, blendSrcFuncAlpha, blendDstFuncAlpha);
1013        }
1014
1015        mesh.render(customShader != null ? customShader : shader, GL20.GL_TRIANGLES, 0, count);
1016
1017        idx = 0;
1018    }
1019
1020    @Override
1021    public void disableBlending () {
1022        if (blendingDisabled) return;
1023        flush();
1024        blendingDisabled = true;
1025    }
1026
1027    @Override
1028    public void enableBlending () {
1029        if (!blendingDisabled) return;
1030        flush();
1031        blendingDisabled = false;
1032    }
1033
1034    @Override
1035    public void setBlendFunction (int srcFunc, int dstFunc) {
1036        setBlendFunctionSeparate(srcFunc, dstFunc, srcFunc, dstFunc);
1037    }
1038
1039    @Override
1040    public void setBlendFunctionSeparate(int srcFuncColor, int dstFuncColor, int srcFuncAlpha, int dstFuncAlpha) {
1041        if (blendSrcFunc == srcFuncColor && blendDstFunc == dstFuncColor && blendSrcFuncAlpha == srcFuncAlpha && blendDstFuncAlpha == dstFuncAlpha) return;
1042        flush();
1043        blendSrcFunc = srcFuncColor;
1044        blendDstFunc = dstFuncColor;
1045        blendSrcFuncAlpha = srcFuncAlpha;
1046        blendDstFuncAlpha = dstFuncAlpha;
1047    }
1048
1049    @Override
1050    public int getBlendSrcFunc () {
1051        return blendSrcFunc;
1052    }
1053
1054    @Override
1055    public int getBlendDstFunc () {
1056        return blendDstFunc;
1057    }
1058
1059    @Override
1060    public int getBlendSrcFuncAlpha() {
1061        return blendSrcFuncAlpha;
1062    }
1063
1064    @Override
1065    public int getBlendDstFuncAlpha() {
1066        return blendDstFuncAlpha;
1067    }
1068
1069    @Override
1070    public void dispose () {
1071        mesh.dispose();
1072        if (ownsShader && shader != null) shader.dispose();
1073    }
1074
1075    @Override
1076    public Matrix4 getProjectionMatrix () {
1077        return projectionMatrix;
1078    }
1079
1080    @Override
1081    public Matrix4 getTransformMatrix () {
1082        return transformMatrix;
1083    }
1084
1085    @Override
1086    public void setProjectionMatrix (Matrix4 projection) {
1087        if (drawing) flush();
1088        projectionMatrix.set(projection);
1089        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1090    }
1091
1092    @Override
1093    public void setTransformMatrix (Matrix4 transform) {
1094        if (drawing) flush();
1095        transformMatrix.set(transform);
1096        if (drawing) setupMatrices();
1097    }
1098
1099    private void setupMatrices () {
1100        combinedMatrix.set(projectionMatrix).mul(transformMatrix);
1101        if (customShader != null) {
1102            customShader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1103            customShader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1104        } else {
1105            shader.setUniformMatrix("u_projTrans", combinedMatrix);
1106            shader.setUniformi("u_texture", 0);
1107        }
1108    }
1109
1110    protected void switchTexture (Texture texture) {
1111        flush();
1112        lastTexture = texture;
1113        invTexWidth = 1.0f / texture.getWidth();
1114        invTexHeight = 1.0f / texture.getHeight();
1115    }
1116
1117    @Override
1118    public void setShader (ShaderProgram shader) {
1119        if (drawing) {
1120            flush();
1121        }
1122        customShader = shader;
1123        if (drawing) {
1124            if (customShader != null)
1125                customShader.bind();
1126            else
1127                this.shader.bind();
1128            setupMatrices();
1129        }
1130    }
1131
1132    @Override
1133    public ShaderProgram getShader () {
1134        if (customShader == null) {
1135            return shader;
1136        }
1137        return customShader;
1138    }
1139
1140    @Override
1141    public boolean isBlendingEnabled () {
1142        return !blendingDisabled;
1143    }
1144
1145    public boolean isDrawing () {
1146        return drawing;
1147    }
1148    public FloatFilter getFilter() {
1149        return filter;
1150    }
1151
1152    public void setFilter(FloatFilter filter) {
1153        this.filter = filter;
1154    }

1156}
